Owiso Odera (March 1974 - November 3, 2016) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri Kenya a mụrụ na Sudan.  O nwere ike ịbụ na a maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya dịka Papa Tunde na usoro telivishọn The Originals  N'afọ 2015, a họpụtara Odera maka Lucille Lortel Award for Outstanding Lead Actor in a Play maka arụmọrụ ya na Katori Hall's play Our Lady of Kibeho na Signature Theatre
A mụrụ Odera na Khartoum, Sudan nye nne Kenya bụ Millicent Obaso na nna ya bụ Henry Odera Oruka n'ọnwa Machị afọ 1974.

Mary's School, Nairobi, ma gụsịa akwụkwọ na klas nke afọ 1991.  Odera nwetara agụmakwụkwọ iji mụọ sayensị kọmputa na Earlham College n'afọ 1992.  Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Earlham n'afọ 1996.  O nwetakwara nzere masta site na mmemme agụsịa akwụkwọ na Mahadum California, San Diego  Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na UCSD n'afọ 2005.
N'elu ikpo okwu, ọ rụrụ na Katori Hall's Our Lady of Kibeho na Signature Theatre, Mat Smart's Samuel J
ya na Justin Long na Williamstown Theatre Festival, na Jay O
Sanders' Unexplored Interior na Museum of Jewish Heritage

Ọ pụtara na usoro telivishọn The Originals, The Good Wife na Madam Secretary  Usoro telivishọn ndị ọzọ ọ pụtara na ha gụnyere Unforgettable, Three Rivers, FlashForward, Minority Report, NCIS: Los Angeles, The Unit, Numbers, The Millers na Blue Bloods  Ọ pụtakwara na usoro Dirt
Odera pụtakwara na ihe nkiri afọ 2007 Relative Obscurity ya na Larisa Oleynik
Odera lụrụ Nicole Comp.  N'oge ọnwụ ya, Odera bi na Santa Monica, California.

Odera nwụrụ na Nọvemba 3, 2016 mgbe ọ dara n'elu ikpo okwu n'oge mmegharị nke Dominique Morisseau's Detroit '67 na Galt House na Louisville, Kentucky.  Ọ dị afọ iri anọ na abụọ.  Ndị ezinụlọ ya ekpugheghị ihe kpatara ọnwụ ya.
Ọ hapụrụ nwunye ya, Nicole, ụmụnne ya ndị nwanyị Sheila na Sharon na ụmụnne ya ndị nwoke Peter na Ronnie.
